title: Easy Trifle
description: A delicious, quick and simple, creamy trifle recipe
author: Sian Preece
instructions: Place 2 sheets of gelatine into a jug/bowl.
Add 1/2 pint (285 ml) of boiling water and stir until dissolved
Slowly pour in the whipping cream whilst stirring
Add 1/2 pint (285 ml) of cold water, stir then pour into mould/serving dish.
Then let the cream full set for 4 hours.
Once set, to make the raspberry jelly follow the same steps as the cream but instead of using sheets of gelatine, simply empty the packet of Hartleys Sugar Free Jelly Raspberry into a jug/bowl
Let this set for an additional 4 hours, then eat!
